sentences: Kasvit voivat lisääntyä sekä siementen että kasvullisesti.
Eläinten määrä on lisääntynyt viime vuosina.
context: The Finnish verb 'lisääntyä' means to increase, grow, multiply, or reproduce. It is an intransitive verb that typically describes when something becomes more numerous, larger in quantity, or reproduces itself. The word often refers to biological reproduction but can also be used for general increase in number or size.
